content: CS-SL SA Smoke and acoustic sleeve Non-fire-rated cable pathway for smoke and acoustic sealing ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster, easier installation for non fire-rated cable penetrations requiring a sleeved opening Re-penetrable and self-closing cable pathway Applications Sealing non-fire-rated penetrations for single cables and cable bundles Ideal for small to medium-sized openings in walls, ceilings and floors Electrical, low-voltage / mid-voltage installations and telecom For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Chemical basis: Polyurethane Shelf life: Not relevant Acoustics performance: Test report available Technical Data | Chemical basis | Polyurethane | Shelf life | Not relevant | 1 | Acoustics performance | Test report available | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 41 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Temperature resistance range | 5 - 140 °F | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry, Drywall | at 77°F/25°C and 50% relative humidity; from date of manufacture ### ITEMS- 2118867 - Smoke & acoustic sleeve CS-SL SA 2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SA 2 Smoke & acoustic sleeve assy - 2118868 - Smoke & acoustic sleeve CS-SL SA 4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SA 4 Smoke & acoustic sleeve assy
